# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="78557-102">Prejemki za branje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="78557-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="78557-103">Če želite zahtevati potrdilo o branju ali potrdilo o dostavi za vaše sporočilo v Outlooku v spletu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="78557-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="78557-104">Izberite tri pike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="78557-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="78557-105">na vrhu podokna za sestavljanje sporočil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="78557-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="78557-106">Izberite **Prikaži možnosti sporočila**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="78557-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="78557-107">Izberite **Zahtevajte potrdilo o branju** ali **Zahtevajte potrdilo o dostavi**ali oboje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="78557-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="78557-108">Če želite izbrati, kako se Outlook odziva na zahteve za branje, pojdite na</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="78557-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="78557-109">**Nastavitve** > **si oglejte vse Outlookove nastavitve** > za**upravljanje sporočil**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="78557-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="78557-110">Če želite več informacij, glejte [branje potrdil v Outlooku v spletu](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="78557-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
